(Simplified: 诓)
Chinese Definition:
Pictophonetic: 匡 indicates the sound; 言 (speech) conveys the meaning.
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 言 [ yán ] words, speech; to speak, to say
    • 匡 [ kuāng ] to correct, to revise; to restore
①欺騙：你不要誆我。誆騙。
誆騙 [ kuāng piàn ]: to defraud; to swindle

誆字的基本解释

誆
kuāng
见“诓”。

誆字的汉语字典释义

[①]［kuāng］
［《廣韻》渠放切，去漾，羣。］
“诓1”的繁体字。
(1)用谎言骗人。
(2)犹哄。用言语或行动引小孩子高兴。
(3)料到。

誆字的康熙字典解释

【酉集上】【言字部】　誆； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页1161第01
【廣韻】渠放切【集韻】具放切，?狂去聲。【類篇】誑也。【廣韻】謬言也。　又【集韻】求往切，狂上聲。義同。　又【字彙】今律爲誆騙字。讀平聲。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［kuāng］
["Guang Yun" Qu Fang cut, go to Yang, group. ]
Traditional characters for "诓1".
(1) Use lies to deceive people.
(2) Still coaxing. Use words or actions to make children happy.
(3) As expected.

[Guang Yun] Qu Fangqie [Jiyun] With Fangqie, go crazy. [Class articles] 诳也. [Guang Yun] Fallacy also.　[Jiyun] Seeking to cut, madly voice. The same meaning.　[Vocabulary] This law is a swindle. Read flat.
